humanize.text

Class HumanizeFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.text.Format
      • humanize.text.HumanizeFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormatProvider, Serializable, Cloneable

    public class HumanizeFormat
extends Format
implements FormatProvider

    Exposes as Formats all the methods annotated with Expose of Humanize class.

    Example: 
     MessageFormat mf = new MessageFormat("size {0, humanize, binaryPrefix}");
 mf.render(8); // "size 8 bytes"
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
